channel.title: Dread's Skyrim Build
channel.description: Recent content on Dread's Skyrim Build

item.title: Extenders
item.description: SKSE64 Download Root Files Installation Download the most current archive for Skyrim SE. Open the downloaded archive and extract the following files to the Skyrim Special Edition folder: (..\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim Special Edition) skse64_X_X_X.dll skse64_loader.exe skse64_steam_loader.dll Data Files Installation Open MO2 and right-click on the mod list. Hover over All Mods and select Create empty mod. Type in SKSE64, or anything similar. Hold down the Ctrl key and double-click on the newly created mod in the mod list.

item.title: Guide changelog
item.description: 2021-08-10 Updated Preparations Updated BethINI settings Updated arguments for Textgen and DynDOLOD Foundation DynDOLOD Resources Updated to v3. Please note that the url has changed. Majestic Mountains Updated install instructions Gameplay Blade and Blunt Changed install instructions to include Blade and Blunt - Timed Block Module. More Craftable Equipment Updated install instructions Character Appearance Caliente’s Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE- Added note - CBBE is no longer recommended CBBE Presets Compendium Added note.

item.title: Patches changelog
item.description: 2021-07-11 Patches updated, removed patches for removed mods 2021-06-27 Updated patches to the latest Adamant/Mundus/Aetherius 2021-06-23 Some patches updated with small changes. Many patches moved to the new mod Animated Heavy Armory. 2021-06-04 Patches updated to support DAR version of Animated Armoury.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Address Library for SKSE Plugins Download Download and install the All-in-One Main File. FileAccess Interface for Skyrim SE Scripts - FISSES Download Only the Main File is required. JContainers SE Download Download and install JContainers SE PapyrusUtil SE - Modders Scripting Utility Functions Download powerofthree’s Papyrus Extender Download Install the main file for SSE Scaleform Translation++ Download Skyrim Skill Uncapper Download SkyUI Download SSE Engine Fixes (skse64 plugin) Download Download and install (Part 1) Engine Download (Part 2) Engine Fixes - skse64 Preloader and TBB Lib.

item.title: Foundation
item.description: Unofficial High Definition Audio Project Download Download and install all Main Files. Merge when asked. Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch Download Skyrim Particle Patch for ENB Download Download and install the Special Edition PARTICLE PATCH ALL-IN-ONE INSTALLATION file. Do not install the plugin, it is not needed. DynDOLOD Resources 3 Download Download and install DynDOLOD Resources SE 3. Install using the following options:

item.title: LOD generation textures
item.description: The mods in this section will be deactivated once LOD has been generated. Cathedral landscapes LOD generation textures Download If you intend to use The Grass Must Grow, these LOD generation textures are redundant. If this is the case, do not install this mod Install LODGEN Textures for v3. Do not merge with the Cathedral landscapes main file that was installed in the Foundational Mods section. SSE-Terrain-Tamriel Download Download the recommended optional SSE-Terrain-Tamriel.

item.title: Animation & Effects
item.description: D13 Faster GET UP STAND UP Animation Download Install loose files. Dynamic Animation Replacer Download EVG Conditional Idles Download Choose full install in the installer. The modular install is also supported. Immersive Animations Download In the installer choose: Main Module Sneaking Strafe Greatsword Sprint Rogue Stab Blocking Animation Pack SSE Download Dual Wield Improved Animation SSEImmersive Interactions - Animated Actions Download Immersive Interactions - Animated Actions Download Adds third person animations for several interactions.

item.title: Lighting & Weather
item.description: An alternative to Cathedral Weathers is Azurite Weathers by the same mod author. It works without any patches, just skip Cathedral Weather and use Azurite Weathers instead. Cathedral Weathers and Seasons Download Install the main file and the unofficial update. Cathedral Weathers MCM Download Dynamic Volumetric Lighting and Sun Shadows Download Install the main file. Luminosity Lighting Overhaul - The Cathedral Concept Download Obsidian Mountain Fogs Download Relighting Skyrim - SSE Download Download and install Relighting Skyrim SSE - Exteriors Only

item.title: Sounds & Music
item.description: Audio Overhaul for Skyrim SE Download Do not install any patches. Better Animal Footsteps Download Choose to install all footstep sounds. Do not install any patches. Better Horse Pain Sounds Download Heart of the Beast - Werewolf Sound and Texture Overhaul Download Recommendation: Feral Werewolf sounds - HIGH AGGRESSION. IHSS - Improved Horse Step Sounds Download Lower Sounding Thieves Guild Door Download Realistic wolf howls Download Recommendation: Realistic Wolf Howls more barks than howls

item.title: Character Appearance
item.description: Argonian Improvements SSE - Horns Download Caliente’s Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE- Download The Nexus page linked above contains NSFW images. No nude options will be used in this guide. If they are forced by the mod, other mods will override the options. Some armor textures featured in the guide is not compatible with CBBE. Using CBBE is not recommended for this reason but is still supported for those users that want to use it.

item.title: Fixes
item.description: 1st Person Candlelight Fix Download Do not install if you use ENB Light. Archery Quick Shot Perk Bug Fix Download Bug Fixes SSE Download Butterflies Land True Download Butterflies Unchained Download Install esl version Enchantment Reload Fix SE Download Eye Normal Map Fix SSE Download Install Eye Normal Map Fix SSE BC7 Fixed Dragon Stalking Fix Download Fuz Ro D-oh - Silent Voice Download Install main and optional files.

item.title: User Interface
item.description: Better Container Controls for SkyUI Download Do not install the main file, install the esl optional file only. If you play with a gamepad, skip this mod completely. Better Dialogue Controls Download Better MessageBox Controls Download Easy Wheelmenu - SSE Conversion Download Easy Wheelmenu for Nether’s Follower Framework Download Font Overhaul - Natural Typefaces for Skyrim Download Use the following install instructions:

item.title: Items
item.description: Armor, Clothing & Accessories Bandolier - Bags and Pouches Classic Download Black Sacrament Armor Download Install Black Sacrament Armour SSE. CBBE users installs Black Sacrament Armour - SSE CBBE BodySlide instead. Install Black Sacrament Armour - ESL version. Delete the file BlackSacramentArmor.esp (keep BlackSacramentArmor.esl). Some optional tweaks are available in this guides patches to make this armor less overpowered. Even so, it is still possible to combine armor pieces in a way that should be considered cheating since it applies armor rating twice, for example using a barette, a hood and a cowl.

item.title: Models & Textures - Weapons and Armors
item.description: RUSTIC ARMOR and WEAPONS SE Download Recommendation: 2K Armor Mesh Fixes SE Download Download and install the main file and the update file. Cathedral - Armory Download and install the main file and the Armor Mesh Fixes SE Patch. CBBE users installs the CBBE BodySlide Patch. aMidianBorn Matching Armory - Glass Armor and Weapons Download aMidianBorn stormcloak officer armour Download Dragon Masks Retextured SE (4K - 2K) Download

item.title: Gameplay
item.description: General Better Jumping SE Download GIST - Genuinely Intelligent Soul Trap SE Download Download and install the Main File. Improvement Names Customized SSE Download SmoothCam Download True Directional Movement - Modernized Third Person Gameplay Download AI & Combat AI Overhaul SSE Download Better Stealth AI for Followers Download Blade and Blunt Download Install the main file and the Blade and Blunt - Timed Block Module file.

item.title: New Characters
item.description: Enemies Arena - An Encounter Zone Overhaul Download Dragon War - A Dragon Overhaul Download Install the main file and the optional file. In the installer, choose patches for: Audio Overhaul Skyrim Deadly Spell Impacts Wyrmstooth OBIS SE - Organized Bandits In Skyrim Special Edition Download Install main file and OBIS SE Patrols addon. Neutral DIVERSE SKYRIM SSE Download Immersive College NPCs Download Use the default settings in the installer.

item.title: Locations
item.description: New Structures & Landmarks Bells of Skyrim Download In the installer, choose to install the JK’s Skyrim patch. Oblivion Gates Remade Download In the installer, choose map markers and Mountain-Like Textures for MAJESTIC MOUNTAINS. Solitude Skyway Download Solstheim Lighthouse Download Install Solstheim Lighthouse v1.2 ESL and HD Raven Rock Brick Texture Replacer Solstheim - Skaal Fishing Camp Download Windhelm Lighthouse Download New Lands Falskaar Download Midwood Isle SE Download Install the main file and the optional Solitude Ship Alternative Location Patch

item.title: ENB
item.description: It is up to you if you want to use an ENB or not. If you already have a problem getting a high enough framerate, you should probably not use an ENB. ENB Download Download the latest version by clicking on the version number in the lower left side of the screen. This open a new page that has the download link on the bottom. Open the downloaded archive and extract the files ‘d3d11.

item.title: ENB Presets
item.description: If you have chosen to use ENB, you are free to use any ENB you want. The following ENB’s are supported with tweaks available in the guides patches later. Choose one of the following ENB’s (just one for now). A Cathedralist’s ENB Download Download A Cathedralist’s ENB or A Cathedralist’s ENB - High Quality. Extract the contents of the downloaded archive to the main game folder.

item.title: Utilities
item.description: BodySlide and Outfit Studio Download Download and install as a normal mod. Instructions to add tool as executable In Mod Organizer 2, click in the Data tab Right click on CalienteTools\BodySlide\BodySlide x64.exe and choose Add as Executable. A dialog box opens asking for a name of the executable. Accept the default name by clicking OK. To set BodySlide to output data to its output mod: Run BodySlide x64 through Mod Organizer Click Settings Click Advanced Click Browse to choose the Output Path and browse to the BodySlide _Output folder.
